title: Codify Merge Gate and Qualified Commit Convention

comment:
PRE-REVIEW: RECOMMEND

Frontmatter verified:
- title: "Codify Merge Gate and Qualified Commit Convention"
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" (appropriate for v0.1)

Structure: All 12 sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present and correctly structured. Section 2 includes all three required subsections (Context, Changes Summary, Files Affected).

Placeholder check: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or unresolved {{...}} placeholders found. Execution-phase [...] placeholders present in Sections 10-11 as expected.

Current State claims verified against effective SOPs:
- SOP-005 Section 7.1: Confirmed 5-step sequence without merge type, prerequisites, or qualified commit specification.
- SOP-006 Section 7.2: Confirmed "single git commit" requirement without dev-branch-vs-main clarification.
- SOP-006 Section 7.4: Confirmed post-review gate exists but no explicit merge gate.
- TEMPLATE-CR CODE CR PATTERNS: Confirmed guidance exists as template comments without SOP procedural backing.

Cross-consistency verified:
- Files in Section 2.3 match Section 7.1 impact table (4 files).
- Documents in Section 7.2 match scope (SOP-005, SOP-006, TEMPLATE-CR).
- Three EIs cover all four files (EI-3 bundles TEMPLATE-CR with its seed copy).
- EI table rows match Implementation Plan sections.
- No SDLC impact correctly claimed (no code changes).

Scope assessment: Appropriate. Addresses exactly the three identified gaps (merge type, qualified commit source, merge gate) without scope creep.

No formatting issues, typos, or errors found. No reviewer assignment needed (process-only CR, no TU domains affected).

POST-REVIEW: RECOMMEND

Frontmatter verified:
- title: "Codify Merge Gate and Qualified Commit Convention" (unchanged from pre-approved)
- revision_summary: "Execution complete: all 3 EIs pass"

Pre-approved content integrity: Sections 1-9 unchanged from pre-approved version. No unauthorized modifications during execution.

EI verification (all independently confirmed):
- EI-1 Pass: SOP-005 confirmed EFFECTIVE v4.0 via qms_status. Section 7.1 rewritten with subsections 7.1.1-7.1.4. Dash formatting correction documented.
- EI-2 Pass: SOP-006 confirmed EFFECTIVE v4.0 via qms_status. Section 7.2 and 7.4 updates verified.
- EI-3 Pass: TEMPLATE-CR confirmed EFFECTIVE v4.0 via qms_status. Seed copy at qms-cli/seed/templates/TEMPLATE-CR.md verified aligned -- CODE CR PATTERNS and Phase 6 content matches QMS copy.

Post-review checklist (SOP-002 Section 7.3):
- All 3 EIs show Pass. No Fail outcomes, no VARs required.
- All controlled documents in scope are EFFECTIVE: SOP-005 v4.0, SOP-006 v4.0, TEMPLATE-CR v4.0.
- revision_summary applied to all modified documents with CR-083 reference.
- SDLC prerequisites: N/A (no code changes, process-only CR).

Execution comments: Two informational entries appropriately documented (dash formatting fix, seed copy alignment).

Execution summary: Complete with deliverables table. No deviations from plan.

No placeholder content, no formatting issues, no deficiencies found.
